data.text: @dgurdasani1 The "just live with it" wave I believe.
@DSlayer520 @DrWilliamKu @dgurdasani1 etc. It's sad. We used to be leaders in how to properly handle pandemic until the current (conservative) gov got elected.

@DSlayer520 @DrWilliamKu @dgurdasani1 Absolutely. Leaders of disasters. We stopped testing first. Tried to stop reporting first but "failed" because no Atlantic province wanted to part take in this nutty experiment, so we stopped reporting immediately after Sask did. We loosen restrictions when deaths hit new records

@OG97921596 @DrWilliamKu @dgurdasani1 Nova Scotia literally seems to be one of the top leaders now in what not to do during a global pandemic at this point. Were now starting to get ahead of Denmark now in some areas.
@DSlayer520 @DrWilliamKu @dgurdasani1 We know this too well here in NS
@DrWilliamKu @OG97921596 @dgurdasani1 That is a massive drop in testing. Might have something to do with the "decrease" in case numbers.

@dgurdasani1 #COVID19 cases appear to be falling in #Denmark but test positivity remains very high.  They appear to be suppressing testing.  Moreover, deaths continue to soar to new records.  Was this all in their plan to #letitrip? https://t.co/ouMylbIOcr
@dgurdasani1 What do you think is causing it?  Could there be a new variant or subvariant?
@JemsODonnell @dgurdasani1 We are playing roulette and will not end well
